mapper.update: update business set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registertime = #{registertime,jdbcType=DATE}, start_price = #{startPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, distribution_fee = #{distributionFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, name, address, phone, registertime, start_price, distribution_fee from business
